driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance from the construction vehicle ahead, being prepared for any sudden stops or turns. Overtaking should only be attempted if the opposite lane is clear and it's safe to do so. Pay attention to road markings and safety poles along the road to stay within the correct lane. Maintain a safe following distance behind the truck to ensure adequate reaction time and visibility. Be prepared to slow down if the truck makes unexpected maneuvers, such as turning or stopping. Keep an eye on the road markings and avoid passing the truck if the road narrows or if there are traffic signs indicating it is unsafe to do so. Continue monitoring the road state for any changes.
